Abstract Strategy Module

class src.strategys.abstract_strategy.AbstractStrategy[source]

Bases: ABC

Abstract interface for trading strategies.

Defines methods for processing market data and generating trade signals.

abstractmethod static generate_signals(mkt_data, cfg, strategy_args=None)[source]

Generate a trade signal based on the provided market data.

Parameters:

  • mkt_data (MktDataState) – MktDataState instance

  • cfg – Configuration instance

Returns:

Signal
